snippet.title: Shadows of the Werewolf | Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
We are thrilled to unveil our latest creation: Shadows of the Werewolf, a spine-chilling horror action/adventure thriller that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Available now on Steam

Shadows of the Werewolf on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2950860/Shadows_of_the_Werewolf

The Steam store page is live, and guess what? A killer demo is on its way soon! 🔥 This is just the beginning, so hit that Wishlist and Follow button on Steam to be the first to get notified when it is available.

Follow us on our social media platforms:
Discord: 
https://discord.gg/NsVg3zp8fz
Regl Studios Steam Developer Page: 
https://store.steampowered.com/developer/reglstudios
Twitter:
https://twitter.com/ReglStudios
Reddit:
https://www.reddit.com/user/ReglStudios/
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/ReglStudios
Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/regl.studios/
